actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-469.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3244) to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to eliminate preemption of a State's authority to establish or enforce any energy efficiency standard or similar requirement if a Federal energy efficiency standard has not been established.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3244 (State energy efficiency standards).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3244) to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to eliminate preemption of a State's authority to establish or enforce any energy efficiency standard or similar requirement if a Federal energy efficiency standard has not been established.
